name: Legacy Brewing Co.
description: Legacy Brewing Co. is committed to handcrafting unique, high quality beer by employing brewing techniques learned from European and American brewers. The complexity of flavors comes from a combination of high quality imported malts and our hopping methods which includes the use of whole flower hops. The Legacy team includes a creative collection of brewers, engineers, a microbiologist and our friends in the arts community; all with a passion for innovative products. Legacy...we brew pure pleasure!
